title: Color Clustering iOS App
description: An iOS application that extracts real-time color palettes using optimized K-Means clustering, on-device inference, and high-performance pixel sampling.

title: Coffee Bean Object Detection & Grading System
description: A computer vision pipeline that detects defects and grades Philippine coffee beans using YOLOv12, MobileNetV3-L, and EfficientNetV2 on a custom expert-validated dataset.

title: Fall Detection iOS App
description: A Core MLâ€“powered safety application that identifies falls using motion sensor data and on-device ML inference with real-time alert triggers.

title: Room Resort Booking Website
description: A full-stack resort room booking system with secure authentication, admin dashboard, and real-time data management.

title: Gym Management System
description: A web-based system for membership tracking, subscription plans, attendance logs, and admin tools.

title: Car Counter System
description: A real-time vehicle counting solution using ESP32-CAM, background subtraction, and computer vision.

title: Personal Portfolio AI Chatbot
description: An intelligent portfolio assistant built with Gemini 2.0 Flash, custom resume context, streaming responses, and a clean floating-chat UI. Supports real-time typing output, persona grounding, and dynamic Q&A based on my projects, skills, and certifications.
